Package vehicles

Class MovingObject

java.lang.Object
vehicles.MovingObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bike, Bus, Car, Pedestrian
public abstract class MovingObject
extends java.lang.Object
Represents an object which performs a movement over the provided route with a predefined speed.
